Reviews.Title: It fry my cam...under powered
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I thought this was a great idea to get 2A power supply at this price. But I was wrong. It promptly fried my IR camera after I plugged them in. Regardless, when this cam was plugged in, the 50' runs are grossly under powered resulting in poor image quality and the IR on and off often, it can't work at night causing the cam to go offline unless there is a light source in the field of view of the cam. Last night, this camera went offline due to this 2A power supply is under powered.This $7 PS has just cost me a $1, 00 in fried my camera! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!! This unit should be pulled from the market and banned from Amazon. Poor quality product without any guarantee.

Reviews.Title: Great! no complsints here.
Reviews.Author: Juan Alicea
Reviews.Content: Read everything. I knew what i was looking for and its description matched what i was looking for. no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Very Bad
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our security cameras and this was supposed to be compatible with. It worked at first, support camera well, but soon got extremely hot. Too hot to even touch for more than a second or two.
